review: I recently visited Dr. Amit Harshana, and I couldn't be more impressed with the care. His communication skills are exceptional, he took the time to listen to all my concerns without rushing me, which immediately made me feel heard and understood. His ability to connect with patients on a personal level is truly remarkable.
reply_text: Thanks a lot. I always try to give my best to my patients.

review: I consulted Dr Amit for my personal sexual health. I was having regular STIs and was getting trouble on regular basis. he quickly diagnosed and treated it. my health is so much better now. I really recommend all to Dr Amit.
I had shown myself for sexual health issues. ** ** **** * ************* ******* I really recommend everyone to go to him. Lovely staff and lovely clinic.

reply_text: Thanks for the feedback. I wish you the best always.
